name: Artisan Breads
description: Handcrafted daily using traditional sourdough starters and organic flour. Our signature loaves are fermented for 24 hours to develop complex flavors.

items.name: Sourdough Classic
items.description: Traditional sourdough loaf with a crisp crust and tangy flavor.

items.name: Multigrain Seeded
items.description: Hearty bread packed with seeds and whole grains.

items.name: French Baguette
items.description: Classic French baguette with a golden crust.

items.name: Rustic Country
items.description: Country-style bread with a chewy texture and rich flavor.

name: French Pastries
description: Delicate layers of buttery perfection. Each croissant is rolled by hand and laminated with premium French butter for an authentic Parisian experience.

items.name: Classic Croissant
items.description: Flaky, buttery croissant made with French butter.

items.name: Pain au Chocolat
items.description: Croissant dough filled with rich chocolate.

items.name: Almond Croissant
items.description: Croissant filled with almond cream and topped with sliced almonds.

items.name: Seasonal Fruit Danish
items.description: Danish pastry topped with seasonal fruits.

name: Artisan Cakes
description: Celebration-worthy creations made from scratch with premium ingredients. Custom designs available for special occasions and memorable moments.

items.name: Chocolate Decadence
items.description: Rich chocolate cake layered with chocolate ganache.

items.name: Vanilla Bean Layer
items.description: Classic vanilla cake with creamy vanilla frosting.

items.name: Red Velvet Classic
items.description: Moist red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting.

items.name: Seasonal Fruit Tart
items.description: Tart filled with pastry cream and topped with fresh fruit.

name: Fresh Cookies
description: Baked fresh throughout the day with real butter and premium chocolate chips. Perfect for sharing or treating yourself to a moment of pure joy.

items.name: Chocolate Chip Classic
items.description: Classic cookie loaded with chocolate chips.

items.name: Oatmeal Raisin
items.description: Chewy oatmeal cookie with plump raisins.

items.name: Double Chocolate
items.description: Rich chocolate cookie with chocolate chunks.

items.name: Sugar Cookie
items.description: Soft sugar cookie with a hint of vanilla.

name: Morning Muffins
description: Start your day right with our wholesome muffins made with fresh fruits and natural ingredients. Perfectly moist and bursting with flavor.

items.name: Blueberry Burst
items.description: Muffin packed with fresh blueberries.

items.name: Banana Walnut
items.description: Banana muffin with crunchy walnuts.

items.name: Chocolate Chip
items.description: Muffin loaded with chocolate chips.

items.name: Lemon Poppy Seed
items.description: Tangy lemon muffin with poppy seeds.

name: Coffee & Beverages
description: Perfectly roasted artisan coffee beans sourced directly from sustainable farms. Each cup is crafted to complement our baked goods beautifully.

items.name: House Blend Espresso
items.description: Bold espresso made from our house blend.

items.name: French Press Coffee
items.description: Smooth coffee brewed in a French press.

items.name: Seasonal Lattes
items.description: Lattes featuring seasonal flavors.

items.name: Fresh Herbal Teas
items.description: Selection of herbal teas brewed fresh.
